annotation.spannedText: Most children who are vaccinated with DTaP will be protected throughout childhood

classMention.mentionClass: Most children who are vaccinated with DTaP will be protected throughout childhood

annotation.spannedText: Diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis vaccine (DTaP) can help prevent these diseases

classMention.mentionClass: Diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis vaccine (DTaP) can help prevent these diseases

annotation.spannedText: Children should get 5 doses of DTaP vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Children should get 5 doses of DTaP vaccine

annotation.spannedText: children who are moderately or severely ill should usually wait until they recover before getting DTaP vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: children who are moderately or severely ill should usually wait until they recover before getting DTaP vaccine

annotation.spannedText: Any child who had a life-threatening allergic reaction after a dose of DTaP should not get another dose

classMention.mentionClass: Any child who had a life-threatening allergic reaction after a dose of DTaP should not get another dose

annotation.spannedText: Any child who suffered a brain or nervous system disease within 7 days after a dose of DTaP should not get another dose

classMention.mentionClass: Any child who suffered a brain or nervous system disease within 7 days after a dose of DTaP should not get another dose

annotation.spannedText: However, a vaccine, like any medicine, is capable of causing serious problems, such as severe allergic reactions

classMention.mentionClass: However, a vaccine, like any medicine, is capable of causing serious problems, such as severe allergic reactions

annotation.spannedText: The risk of DTaP vaccine causing serious harm, or death, is extremely small

classMention.mentionClass: The risk of DTaP vaccine causing serious harm, or death, is extremely small

annotation.spannedText: It is also important if another family member has had seizures

classMention.mentionClass: It is also important if another family member has had seizures

annotation.spannedText: Controlling fever is especially important for children who have had seizures, for any reason

classMention.mentionClass: Controlling fever is especially important for children who have had seizures, for any reason

annotation.spannedText: the reaction should be reported to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS)

classMention.mentionClass: the reaction should be reported to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS)
